channel.title: Ban Cesko Bro from the Models section
channel.description:
He's filling the board with useless posts. All his posts in the section could be converted to one topic, and achieve the same goal. Basically each topic is 2 lines of text and the release of models (that he also did not make, making drop models don't count either since that's just moving it from the wield position to the ground rofl). https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,663941.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664918.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664917.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664916.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664808.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664811.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664805.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664785.0.html https://www.moparisthebest.com/smf/index.php/topic,664781.0.html
[size=1pt]spam is spam. inb4 he gets butthurt.[/size]

item.title: Ban Cesko Bro from the Models section
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“Jmood, post:9, topic:546069”]Because you have say in someone getting banned. Ok I suggest we ban you.

If anyone else wants to become admin of the wiki talk to t4.[/quote]
No, I have no say in it. lol.
[size=1pt]can’t have an opinion apparently[/size]

Read full topic

item.title: Ban Cesko Bro from the Models section
item.dc:creator: @sk8rdude461 sk8rdude461
item.description:
@sk8rdude461 wrote:

[quote=“John, post:7, topic:546069”][quote author=sk8rdude461 link=topic=664965.msg4445331#msg4445331 date=1408480207]

You could have just reported the posts or messaged a moderator requesting a topic merge.

I can’t exactly report a person for an opinion. Sorry.
[/quote]
If you read what I posted, I said you can request a topic merge, not request a forum ban.[/quote]
Yes, but this is my evidence on why I want him banned. Regardless of me asking for a merge or not, I’d still have the topics linked (if they still existed) because of that.

Read full topic
